```{r generate_package_table}
# How to set hyperlinks for each package:
#   https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35078430/including-links-within-rmarkdown-tables-pdf

library(knitr)
library(stringr)
pkgs <- as.data.frame(available.packages(repos='file:/path/to/drat_repo'), stringsAsFactors = F)
# alphabetical order
pkgs <- pkgs[order(pkgs$Package),]

# Parse out the title from each package for a short description of what the package does
pkgs$Title <- sapply(pkgs$Package, function(pkg) {
    title <- packageDescription(pkg, fields = c('Title'))
    title <- gsub("\\s+", " ", str_trim(title))
})

kable(pkgs[,c("Package","Title","Version")], format = 'markdown', row.names = FALSE)
```
